name: kaleidoscope
description:
Add background effects and generate geometric patterns

Adding ”colorful illumination” makes the color more intense

Get more interesting effects

Recommended strength : 0.2～0.4

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Added image used in combination with "KiraKiraEffect" LoRA

Click here for "KiraKiraEffect" > https://civitai.com/models/64490/kirakiraeffect

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description: Generates mysterious artifacts when applied at high intensity
